content: these gloves are looking nice with a dress or jacket **recommended material ** 100 g yarn 100-120 m/50 g 110-131 yd/50 m crochet hook size 2 5 **this pattern includes ** written instruction fotos and chart instruction in english american terminology and german **crochet level ** beginner you should know how to crochet chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet rsc reverse single_crochet all patterns in this shop are my designs and my instructions and are protected to a copyright © jutta maria guerth **terms of use ** do not use my pattern for mass production and do not reproduce my pattern in any media it is prohibited to use my pattern for commercial purposes all rights reserved all documents are the property of jutta maria guerth you have my permission to sell the finished product that you make from my pattern if selling a finished product online made of my pattern please include a link back to my pattern due to digital nature there is no refund on downloaded patterns if you have further questions please do not hesitate to ask me thank you for respecting my work jutta
